sub_topic: Show that every group of order 40 is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C40, the dihedral group D20, or one of the eight non-abelian groups of order 40.
message_1: Consider a group G of order 40. Determine whether G is isomorphic to the cyclic group C40, the dihedral group D20 or one of the eight non-abelian groups of order 40. Justify your answer.
